Call Jahi

Summon Commander:#2631 Jahi
The Jahis, 'whores', are thought to be the wives of the Destructive Spirit. They are seducers of men and apostles of Druj, falsehood. The Jahis are sent to lead mortals astray and spread wickedness and evil thoughts to the realms of men.
